item.description:
Foundation Rites of the Munay-Ki - gifting group
Saturday, February 23, 9:30-noon with Judy
$20 requested donation to support space rental
      The Rites of the Munay-Ki are energetic initiations to help us step into our full power and potential as lightbearers and stewards of the earth.
This gifting group will include a DVD with Alberto Villodo to explain the Rites. Each participant will receive the four Foundation Rites: The Healer's Rite, The Bands of Protection and Power, the Seers Rite and the Harmony Rite. Read more at http://www.munay-ki.org/. Judy is a Munay-Ki graduate. This will be a sacred circle, with opening ceremony to honor the four directions, a meditation for each Rite, and individual gifting of the Rites. These are powerful openings to help us move toward our highest levels of service.

  To see all programs at A Higher Balance go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.name: Rites of the Munay-Ki Gifting Group
